Room.Name: Izitara's Meditation Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small meditation chamber complete with incense and candles.
Room.LongDescription: Izitara is the spiritual leader of the City of Kista, and is a devout Priestess of the Philosophy of Wisdom. Izitara dedicates her work to the teaching of this philosophy, especially for those who are seeking knowledge and wisdom for personal gain instead of providing excuses for those events of catastrophic nature, including death. She will no doubt try to pursuade you that philosophy is mighter than strength.
